name: Gluten Free Penne with Pistachio Pesto and Heirloom Tomato Salad
author: Barilla
summary: A delicious gluten free pasta salad with pistachio pesto and heirloom tomatoes.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) box Barilla Gluten Free Penne
½ cup extra-virgin olive oil, divided
Salt and black pepper to taste
directions: Place diced tomatoes in a large mixing bowl and season with salt and pepper
Drizzle tomatoes with olive oil and set aside
Bring a large pot of water to a boil, add salt
Cook pasta 1 minute less than required cooking time on package
Combine basil, pistachio, garlic, Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese and romano cheese in a blender
Pulse on medium high for 15 seconds
Turn blender to medium speed and slowly drizzle in the remaining olive oil to emulsify the pesto
Add ice cubes and blend to combine
Pour pesto into a large mixing bowl
Drain pasta and reserve 1/2 cup of the pasta cooking water
Add pasta and pasta cooking water to pesto
Top with the heirloom tomatoes before serving
